title: My account litterly got banned for no reason..
body:
I wanted to log in to my account, and suddenly it said my account is banned and i have to check my email for further options. Well ok, then i log in to my mail and havent recieved anything and i decieded to write them a ticket, and i did that 3 days ago but they havent answerd me, i spend tons of money on that account and i want it back, or atleast i just wanna know why it got banned?


Can someone help me plz!

replies.body: I got a 2 week ban too with no chat bans for being a wierdo my first game and in the 2nd game i was messing with my friend because he wouldnt join the discord and everytime he talked i would call him a %%%got feeder. I dont even know who would report me both of those games because everyone knew it was a joke.

It is ok, their report against you was just a joke too.

Be glad it was only a 14 day suspension, usually hate speech is perma ban on sight.
I was in a 4 man and everytime i called him that it was in team chat so im still confused. The other random knew i was just being crazy and knew i was messing with my friend.
Obviously someone didn't find it funny.

When your in all caps screaming GO PACKERS LETS F###ING GO BABY, its really wierd if anyone thought i was being toxic. And i read a similar report about someone getting a 14 day suspension when they were in a 5 man saying stupid things in team chat.
Probably a Vikings or Bears fan.
Hehe. But still my first game report was just plain out wierd and i dont even know why it was put there

Just got banned for telling 2 times my my feeding renekton and lee sin were "too heavy" without swearing. 14 days ban... 

Ps: the enemy TF said his team was playing vs bots (he was 2-0-3 at 30min) so i just said to him: "2 kills vs bots, lol tf you suk" as a joke, he didn't even get mad out of it

PS#2: i also spend 250-300$ over the 4-5 years i played this game...

Yea i know the feeling, 1 week ago i got perma banned from nowhere. But they sent me an email where they said i was using hack's or script's witch is not true and to be more interesting i can't prove it. Even if i can Riot will not care and they keep my account banned. Funny life i was playing on that account for 5-6 years and just like you i was buying skins and stuff.  And the dumb question is why should i invest money into a account witch i am using for playing the game with hack's and script's with an 100% chance to be banned.
Riot is never doing mistakes :D
Just have to wait, there is little to nothing you can do until they response.
see your first problem is spending money on this game
